definitions.definition: Large ; great in size , extent , capacity , or bulk ; for example spacious , roomy or widely extended .
examples: We have an ample supply of water
She has a very ample bosom.

definitions.definition: Not contracted or brief ; not concise ; extended ; diffusive

main_definition: Large ; great in size , extent , capacity , or bulk ; for example spacious , roomy or widely extended .
secondary_definitions: Not contracted or brief ; not concise ; extended ; diffusive
